commandTraits.name: Battle-lust
commandTraits.description: You can re-roll run rolls and charge rolls for this general.

commandTraits.name: High Priest
commandTraits.description: You can re-roll chanting rolls for this general.

commandTraits.name: Skilled Leader
commandTraits.description: If this general is on the battlefield at the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 5+, you receive 1 extra command point.

commandTraits.name: Heroic Stature
commandTraits.description: Add 1 to this generalâ€™s Wounds characteristic.

commandTraits.name: Master of Magic
commandTraits.description: Once per hero phase, you can re-roll 1 casting roll, dispelling roll or unbinding roll for this general.
